text: James Brown (born February 25, 1951) is an African-American sportscaster and the current host of The NFL Today. His other jobs include these: *College Basketball on CBS color commentator *NBA on CBS color commentator *College Basketball on CBS play-by-play *NBA on CBS play-by-play *NFL on CBS play-by- play *NFL on CBS sideline reporter *College Basketball on CBS sideline reporter *NBA on CBS sideline reporter *College Basketball on CBS Studio Host *NFL on Fox Studio Host *NHL on Fox Studio Host *Inside the NFL Host *The World's Funniest! Host *Real Sports with Bryant Gumbel correspondent * WDVM-TV sports anchor Category:Living people Category:1951 births Category:College basketball broadcasters Category:National Basketball Association broadcasters Category:National Hockey League broadcasters Category:National Football League broadcasters
title: James Brown (sportscaster)
